Urbana, Illinois
December 10, 1953
Mr. Seymour N. Siegel
Radio Station WHYC
Municipal Building
New York, New York
Dear Si;
Thanks for your note regarding Monitoring
Study. Dates have been thoroughly considered.
Researchers, including the Research Committee,
Schramm, Smythe, Remmers, and the Executive
Committee all see no objections, and certain
advantages in not using January 3-9 dates.
Thatâ€™s reason decision was made accordingly,
Remmers plans to see you when he comes to New
York, next week, I believe.
Sincerely
Treasurer
FES/bC
oc; Skornia ^
Ausmus
Coleman
